summary:
Harry, stroking Ginny’s hair: You're so tiny and adorable.
Ginny, half asleep: I could literally kick your ass right now.
Harry,...
body:
Harry, stroking Ginny’s hair: You’re so tiny and adorable.

Ginny, half asleep: I could literally kick your ass right now.

Harry, looking at Ginny with heart eyes: I know.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: Hi, I believe that sweet pea would be placed into Hufflepuff and for people that think he would in Slytherin or maybe even...
caption:
Hi, I believe that sweet pea would be placed into Hufflepuff and for people that think he would in Slytherin or maybe even Gryffindor. The characteristics of Hufflepuff are:
Dedication
Hardworking,
Fairness,
Patience,
Kindness,
Tolerance,
Unafraid of toil,
and Loyalty.

Which Sweet pea does show the most being his grand amount of loyalty towards not only the serpents, but more specific Fangs and (in later episodes) Jughead. He also shows tolerance for the north side of Riverdale and my reasoning for that is Toni says that the north side has been dumping on the south side for years before he did anything. Before anyone says that FP Jones keep him from doing anything about the north side. That goes back to his loyalty for the serpents. Also he shows kindness and fairness for fangs after he gets shot and that might just be Jordan Connor’s amazing acting performance of his character anger and sadness by in some scenes tearing up while talking about what has happened to Fangs. That might just be Jordan but it’s still Sweet Pea. Along with the way he acts towards his friends. People may think that he is in Gryffindor because of his hot headedness but that might be out his dedication for his friends and his family (serpents) but we don’t know his whole story sense is created by the CW writing team for who knows what reason. He even shows his patience and hardworking manners by taking off his jacket (pride) not something a true Gryffindor would ever do and wearing that awful uniform just because he wanted a better education. Also Sweet Pea is not a sly, ambitions character so that removes Slytherin from his personality that just leaves Ravenclaw which I don’t think that he is depicted as overly wise like a Ravenclaw. That just leaves Hufflepuff which I believe that he could get into just on his loyalty alone but his best match at least in my opinion would be the hybrid house Huffledor.

Now that my point had been established which is a opinion not a fact so you have the choice to agree or disagree with me. Thanks for reading rebloging and liking.

summary:
Draco: I like Harry
Lucius: What?
Draco: I like hairy... wizards!... witches! I like hairy witches
Lucius: Oh, you are not gay,...
body:
Draco: I like Harry
Lucius: What?
Draco: I like hairy... wizards!... witches! I like hairy witches
Lucius: Oh, you are not gay, then? I ship you and Potter

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
